title: Kuna Border (2009) New Testament
title_vernacular: Kuna Abu Igar 2009 New Testament Border Dialect
description: The Kuna language (formerly Cuna, and in the language itself Guna), spoken by the Kuna people of Panama and Colombia, belongs to the Chibchan language family.

language.name: Border Kuna
language.area: North coast region near Panama isthmus. Also in Panama.
